trans-unit.source: A trigger action that pauses a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to pause a Storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> sospendere uno Storyboard.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> interessa solo un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> quando è attivo (dopo il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> Avvia).

trans-unit.source: To control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Al controllo un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> deve fare riferimento il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> del <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> che controlla che <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) per un esempio.
A partire da un'animazione in pausa

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered after it has been paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> azione viene attivata dopo che è stata sospesa, viene visualizzato per riprendere e riavviare.

trans-unit.source: That's not what actually happens, however: the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action actually replaces itself with an unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: Che non viene effettivamente visualizzata, tuttavia: il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> azione sostituisce la stessa con una versione non sospesa.

trans-unit.source: Each time a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered, clock objects are created for its storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Ogni volta che un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> azione viene attivata, vengono creati oggetti orologio dello storyboard.

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: Questi orologi vengono distribuiti alle proprietà animate.

trans-unit.source: So, when a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is triggered again, it doesn't restart its clocks, it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso, quando un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> viene attivato, non vengono riavviati clock, li sostituisce con gli orologi di nuovo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard" />.
